bibl.title: Roman Criminal Law in a Berlin Papyrus Codex (BGU IV 1024-1027).
bibl.note: Paper delivered before the Israel Society for the Promotion of Classical Studies, 21 May 1986. - 1. The Codex. - 2. The Law Cases. - 3. The Seventh Case: Murder in Alexandria. - 4. Taubenschlag and the Codex. - 5. Conclusion.
